page.title: 06BROWNIES
page.content: Brownies are helpful, friendly and they lend a hand. They are dressed in brown and a yellow tie and brown belt. Our pack is called 1st Helperby Pack and meets in the village hall on Monday nights. In our pack there are 17 brownies. The brownies have been twice to Lightwater Valley. We have had a sausage sizzle, that is a barbecue and played a few games. We have sixes called Elves, Sprites, Pixies, Imps, Gnomes, Irish Lepricornsand many more. When we make our Promise we get a little silver badge on the tie and some badges. We have a leader called Brown Owl and helpers called Snowy Owl & Tawny Owl. When you are eleven you go on to guides. Brownies have lots of tasks to win badges for things like swimming, home help, dancing, safety in the home etc. Elizabeth Wise.
